transcript:
meditation in breath or with meditation
can be a really great way of self-
soothing so if you have you know a
hardcore thing at work happens you get
fully triggered by your boss go into
your office shut your door and go on to
YouTube Type in 10minute breath work and
take 10 minutes just to reenter yourself
and get yourself back to where you need
to be because I find that when I do
breath work I'm way more calm I'm way
more centered in my my meditations end
up being way better when I don't do
breath work before meditation I usually
just think about other that I have
to get done for the day like
it ends up being really hard sometimes
